Package cps.mouradalpha.plugins

Class PublisherPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • cps.mouradalpha.plugins.PublisherPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagementImplementationI, PublicationCI, PublicationImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class PublisherPlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
implements PublicationCI, ManagementImplementationI
    The class PublisherPlugin is a plugin that can be used by a component in order to get Publisher services.
    Author:
    Alpha Issiaga DIALLO / Mourad TOUATI
    See Also:
